text: The Black Pyramid||[[col:red]]You must conquer the Black Pyramid first![[/col]]

Raise the Black Pyramid||Perform a [[col:yellow]]Grand Ritual[[/col]] to Ascend both Nagash and the Black Pyramid, returning both to their fullest power.\\n[[col:red]]Activating the Grand Ritual will take Nagash off the map, as he performs the Grand Resurrection. Hold out against the invasion to unlock Ascended Nagash, and the Empowered Black Pyramid![[/col]]

The Black Pyramid||[[col:green]]The Black Pyramid[[/col]] is empowered, and Nagash is Ascended. Travel onwards and crush the foolish living underfoot!\\nClick to make Nagash and the black pyramid fly to the settlement of your choice within the radius
The Black Pyramid||Hold off the Skaven Invasion and finish the [[col:yellow]]Grand Ritual[[/col]]!
Places of Death||These sites of power are of outmost importance to complete The Great Ritual.
Perform The Ritual of Ascension in the Black Pyramid and restore Nagash to his true self!
Perform The Great Ritual by researching the technology [[img:icon_tech]][[/img]][[col:yellow]]The Final Step[[/col]]
[[col:red]]This unit will unlock after researching technology [[img:icon_tech]][[/img]]Skull Collector[[/col]]
